review: That was our first visit with Dr Senthil.. we went for our both  Kids's Tummy infection. Doctor never scares us and explains clearly what to do and what not. Again he is friendly with kids. He made us comfortable throughly the session. Clean clinic. kids playarea was maintained well. Thanks.
I went for fever check up Dr. Explained everything thing very nicelya and politely and he is so friendly with kids and what ever queries I had he answered all.
The doctor treats well but consultation fee is too much high.ordinary people can't afford it.they have to look into the fee

Doctor hesitant to respond in emergency always want us to visit hospital or clinic even for some basic enquiries, we being parent of pre term delivered twins (which was recommended and done by doctor), our crucial time query never addressed. We are not all happy with his way of communication and suggestions
Dr Senthil has good experienc I want to recommend to my friends.He suggest good advice to his patients and never neglect kids condition . Always give his best performance.

review: Went for newborn discoloration and jaundice. Patiently understand and explains the problem in simple  words. He strives for conservative and natural means for recovery.

review: Excellent Service, Doctor is very friendly and answer to all our quarries. Very happy. Very clean Clinic
